channel.title: Changing the home and respawn area
channel.description: Hi i guys im using a delta 317 base and i want to change the home and respawn area but i dont know where? can u help me? Also i dont understand moving to exact position with coords like on coords list it says say 3142 5463 for sayy kbd and i want to spawn you at the center but spawns u at say oposite side of lever can somebody help me work out coords so i can change to excat position

item.title: Changing the home and respawn area
item.dc:creator: @cuz cuz
item.description:
@cuz wrote:

Search for deathstage, then within the first deathstage you should see co-ordinates. Those are your respawn co-ordinates.

To change the home teleport, teleport to the current home location and use ::mypos, then search for the X co-ordinate in clickingmost.java and change the X and Y co-ordinates to the co-ordinates of your choice.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing the home and respawn area

1.Go onto your server and type in ::mypos
Search the coordinates you get in your client files and change the coordinates you find to the new ones you want.
